entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
